1309:2: samāsataḥ samādhivaśitāprāptasya samādhivaśitāsanniśrayeṇocchāmātrāt sarvārthasamṛddhiḥ karmaṇyacittasya suparibhāvitacittasyāryaḥ prabhāva ityucyate|
1309:3: dharmāṇāñca yā mahāphalatā mahānuśaṃsatā sā teṣāṃ prabhāva ityucyate|
1309:4: pūrvaṃ mahāpuṇyasaṃbhāropacayād buddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca sahajā āścaryādbhutadharmatā|
1309:6: sa khalveṣa prakārabhedena buddhabodhisattvānāṃ pañcavidho bhavati|
1309:7: abhijñāprabhāvo dharmaprabhāvaḥ sahajaśca prabhāvaḥ sādhāraṇaśca śrāvaka pratyekabudvairasādhāraṇaśca taiḥ|
1309:8: tatra ṣaḍbhijñāḥ-ṛddhiviṣayo divyaṃ śrotraṃcetasaḥ paryāyaḥ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtiścyutyupapādadarśanamāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyā ca abhijñāprabhāva ityucyate|
1309:9: tatra ṣaṭpāramitāḥ-dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntirvīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā ca dharmā ityucyante|
1309:10: teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yo'nubhāvaḥ sa dharmaprabhāva ityucyate|
1309:16: tadyathā kampanaṃ jvalanaṃ spharaṇaṃ vidarśanamanyathībhāvakaraṇaṃ gamanāgamanaṃ saṃkṣepaḥ prathanaṃ sarvarūpakāyapraveśanaṃ sabhāgatopasaṃkrāntirāvirbhāvastirobhāvaḥ vaśitvakaraṇaṃ pararddhayabhibhavanaṃ pratibhānadānaṃ smṛtidānaṃ sukhadānaṃ raśmipramokṣaśca ityevaṃbhāgīyā ṛddhi pāriṇāmikītyucyate|
1309:18: iha tathāgataḥ samādhivaśitāprāpto vā karmaṇyacitto vā bodhisattvo vihāramapi kampayati|
1309:19: gṛhamapi grāmanagarakṣetramapi narakalokamapi tiryaglokamapi pretalokamapi manuṣyalokamapi devalokamapi cāturdvīpakamapi sāhasrikamapi lokadhātuṃ dvisāhasrikamapi trisāhasramahāsāhasramapi lokadhātuṃ trisāhasraśatamapi sahasramapi śatasahasramapi yāvadaprameyānasaṃkhyeyān trisāhasramahāsāhasrān lokadhātūn kampayati|
1309:27: sarvakāyena prajvalitasya vividhā arciṣaḥ kāyānnirgacchanti nīlapītalohitāvadātamāñjiṣṭhāḥ sphaṭikavarṇāḥ|
1309:29: yathāpi tadgṛhamapyābhayā spharati vihāramapi pūrvavadyāvadaprameyānasaṃkhyām lokadhātūnābhayā spharati pūrvavattadyathā kampane|
1309:31: yathā sukhopaniṣaṇṇādyāgatāyāḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇaśrāvakabodhisattvadevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāyāḥ pariṣadaḥ tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā apāyānapi vidarśayatyadhaḥ|
1309:34: teṣu ca buddhabodhisattvān yāvadgaṅgānadībālukāsamānyapi buddhakṣetrāṇyatikramya yena nāmnā saṃśabditaṃ bhavati buddhakṣetraṃ tatra ca buddhakṣetre yannāmako bhavati tathāgataḥ tacca buddhakṣetraṃ darśayati tañca tathāgatam|
1309:35: tacca nāma vyapadiśati tasya buddhakṣetrasya tathāgatasya ca|
1309:36: tato'pyarvāgvidarśaṃyati vyapadiśati tato'pi pareṇa yatkāmaṃ yāvatkāmam|
1309:38: sa cet pṛthivīmapo'dhimucyate tattathaiva bhavati nānyathā|
1309:39: tejo vāyumadhimucyate tadapi tathaiva bhavati nānyathā|
1309:46: yathā mahābhūteṣvanyonyapariṇāme nānyathībhāvakriyā evaṃ rūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyeṣu veditavyam|
1309:49: himavantaṃ vā parvatarājamādiṃ kṛtvā sarvaparvatān suvarṇaṃmadhimucyate|
1309:53: tadubhayavivarjitānāṃ suvarṇatāṃ vā durvarṇatāṃ vā tadubhayaṃ vā|
1309:54: yathā suvarṇadurvarṇatāmevaṃ vyaṅgāvyaṅgatāṃ kṛśa sthūlatāmityevamādi yatkiñcidanyathā satsvalakṣaṇataḥ śakyarūpañcā [nyathā]'dhimucyate|
1309:57: tiraḥ kuḍyaṃ tiraḥ śailaṃ tiraḥ prākāramasajyamānena kāyena gacchati vistareṇa yāvadbrahmalokamupasaṃkrāmati pratyāgacchati ca yāvadakaniṣṭhādūrdhvaṃ tiryagvā punaryāvadaprameyānasaṃkhyeyāṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasrān lokadhātūn gacchati āgacchati ca kāyena vā audārikeṇa cāturmahābhautikena|
1309:58: dūraṃ cāsannamadhimucya manaḥsadṛśena vā javena gacchati cāgacchati ca|
1309:63: mahatyā vicitrāyāḥ pariṣadaḥ purastāt sa grāmanigamatṛṇavana[-bhūmi-] parvataṃ rūpakāyamātmakāye praveśayati|
1309:64: sā ca sarvā pariṣattasminneva kāye praviṣṭamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte|
1309:67: upasaṃkrāntasya yādṛśī teṣāṃ varṇapuṣkalatā bhavati tādṛśī tasya|
1309:71: yamapi te'rthaṃ na mantrayante tamapi so'rthaṃ na mantrayate|
1309:72: uttaraṃ caitānānudhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśayitvā samādāpayitvā samuttejayitvā saṃpraharṣayitvā'ntarddhīyate|
1309:73: antarhitañcainaṃ na prajānanti ko'nveṣo'ntarhito devo vā manuṣyo veti|
1309:74: yathā kṣatriyapariṣadamevaṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatiśramaṇapariṣadaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikān devān trayastriṃśān yāmāṃstuṣitānnirmāṇaratīnparanirmitavaśavartino devānevaṃ brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitānmahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhānapramāṇābhānābhāsvarān parīttaśubhānapramāṇaśubhān śubhakṛssnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalānasaṃjñisattvān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanānakaniṣṭhān|
1309:76: mahatyā pariṣadaḥ purastācchatakṛtvaḥ sahasrakṛtvaḥ ato vā pareṇāntardhīyate|
1309:79: yāvān kaścit sattvadhātuḥ taṃ sarva gamanāgamanasthānādyāsu kriyāsu saṃvartayati|
1309:80: sa cedasyai vaṃ bhavati gacchatu gacchati|
1309:86: niṣṭhāgato bodhisattva ekajātipratibaddhaśca caramabhaviko vā tathāgataṃ sthāpayitvā tulyajātīyañca bodhisattvaṃ tadanyeṣāṃ savaṣāmṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhibhavati|
1309:87: tadanye bodhisattvā utkṛṣṭatarabhūmipraviṣṭāṃstulyajātīyāṃśca bodhisattvān sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣāṃ sarvarddhimatāmṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhibhavanti|
1309:93: ye'sya bhāṣamāṇasya dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti teṣāṃ tādṛśaṃ kāyikaṃ caitasikamanugrahamupasaṃharati pratiprasrabdhi sukham|
1309:96: tatra raśmipramokṣaḥ bodhisattvo vā tathāgato vā ṛddhyātadrūpān raśmīn kāyatpramuñcati ya ekatyā daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā nārakāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ nārakāṇi duḥkhāni pratiprasrambhayati|
1309:97: ekatyā devalokasthānudārān devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragān svabhavanasthān gatvā ihāgamanāya saṃcodayati|
1309:98: tathā tadanyalokadhātusthitān bodhisattvānihāgamanāya saṃcodayati daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu|
1309:99: samāsatasthāgataḥ aprameyairasaṃkhyeyairnānāprakārai raśmibhirapramāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ vicitramaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamarthaṃ karoti|
1309:100: te punarete sarve pāriṇāmikyā ṛddhyāḥ prakārā ekaikaśaḥ prabhidyamānā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā veditavyāḥ|
1309:101: anyathā prakṛtyā vidyamānasya vastunastadanyathāvikārāpādanatā pariṇāma ityucyate|
1309:108: tatpunaḥ kāyanirmāṇamātmano vā sadṛśaṃ visadṛśaṃ vā parasya vā sadṛśaṃ visadṛśaṃ vā nirmimīte|
1309:112: tadyathā bhojanapānādi maṇimuktāvaidūryādi ca yatkiñcidrūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyasaṃgṛhītaṃ bāhyamupakaraṇaṃ tatsadṛśaṃ tadvinirmuktaṃ sarvaṃ yathākāmaṃ nirmimīte|
1309:113: tatpunarātmasabhāgamanekavidhaṃ bahu nānāprakāraṃ devanāga-[yakṣā] suragaruḍakinnaramahoragavarṇa manuṣyavarṇa tiryakpretanārakavarṇaṃ śrāvakavarṇaṃ pratyekabuddhavarṇaṃ bodhisattvavarṇaṃ tathāgatavarṇam|
1309:114: sa yadi tādṛśa eva bodhisattvo bhavati tādṛśameva nirmimīte|
1309:117: sa cetparaṃ devabhūtaṃ tatsādṛśyena nirmimīte parasadṛśamasya tannirmāṇaṃ bhavati|
1309:121: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sakṛdaprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām arthaṃ karoti tairvicitravarṇanirmitaiḥ|
1309:122: kiñcicca nirmāṇamadhitiṣṭhati yaduparate'pi bodhisattve tathāgete vā'nuvartata eva|
1309:123: kiñcinnirmāṇaṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ kevalaṃ sattvānāṃ vidarśanāya māyopamaṃ bhavati|
1309:129: asti viśadasvarānvitaṃ svasambaddhaṃ parasambaddhamasambaddhaṃ dharmadeśanāsaṃgṛhītaṃ pramattasaṃcodanā-saṃgṛhītañca|
1309:131: buddhabodhisattvānāṃ nirmito vāgvyāhāro gambhīro bhavati megharavaḥ kalaviṅkamanojñasvarasadṛśo hṛdayaṃgamaḥ gremaṇīyaḥ|
1309:132: paurī ca sā vāṅnirmitā bhavati valguvispaṣṭā vijñeyā śravaṇīyā apratikūlā aniśritā aparyantā|
1309:134: ākāṃkṣamāṇaḥ tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā vicitrāṃ devanāgayakṣāsura garuḍakinnaramahoragaśrāvakabodhisattvapariṣadaṃ sanniṣaṇṇāṃ sannipatitāṃ yāvadyojanaśatapariṣanmaṇḍalaparyantāṃ sarvāṃ svareṇa suparipūrṇena vijñāpayati ye'pi dūre ya'pyantike niṣaṇṇāḥ|
1309:136: dvisāhasraṃ vā trisāhasraṃ vā yāvaddaśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn svareṇa vijñāpayati|
1309:139: tatra svasambaddhaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ yatsvayameva nirmitayā vācā dharmaṃ vā deśayati pramattaṃ vā saṃcodayati|
1309:140: parasaṃbaddhaṃ punaryat paranirmitayā vācā dharmaṃ vā deśayati pramattaṃ vā saṃcodayati|
1309:141: tatrāsambaddhaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ yadākāśāt vāṅniścarati nirmitādvā na sattvasantānāt|
1309:142: tatra dharmadeśanānirmāṇaṃ yat tatra tatra sammūḍhānāṃ yuktisaṃdarśanārtham|
1309:143: tatra codanānirmāṇaṃ yadasammūḍhānāṃ pratilabdhaprasādānāṃ pramattānāṃ pramāde hrīsaṃjananāya apramāde ca samādāpanāya|
1309:145: samāsataḥ kāyanirmāṇaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ viṣaya nirmāṇañca veditavyam|
1309:148: sā punareṣā dvividhāpi ṛddhirbuddhabodhisattvānāṃ samāsato dve kārye niṣpādayati|
1309:149: āvarjayitvā vā ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa sattvān buddhaśāsane'vatārayati anugrahaṃ vā anekavidhaṃ bahu nānāprakāraṃ duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāmupasaṃharati|
1309:151: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā ātmanaivātmanastāvatpūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmarati amukā nāma te sattvā yatrāhamabhūvamevannāmeti vistareṇa yathāsūtraṃ sattvakāyadikaṃ sarvamanusmarati|
1309:152: yathā cātmanātmanaḥ samanusmarati tathā pareṣāmapi anusmārayati|
1309:154: ye'pi te sattvakāyāḥ pūrvānte yannivāsā stānapyātmanā smarati pareṣāṃ smārayati amukā nāma te sattvā yatrāhamabhūvamevaṃnāmeti vistareṇa|
1309:155: teṣāmapi sattvānāṃ tathaiva sarvaṃ pūrvenivāsamanusmarati yathaivātmano dṛṣṭadharme|
1309:156: sūkṣmamapi samanusmarati yatkiñcidalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā pūrvaceṣṭitaṃ pūrvameva cetayitvā apramuṣitam|
1309:159: yasya kalpagaṇanāyogena śakyā saṃkhyāṃ kartum aprameyāsaṃkhyeyamapyanusmarati|
1309:160: yasya kalpagaṇanāyogenāśakyā saṃkhyāṃ kartum avyāhatamasya samāsataḥ pūrvenivāsajñānaṃ pravartate yatreṣṭaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ yāvadiṣṭam|
1309:161: evaṃrūpo bodhisattvasya tathāgatasya ca pūrvenivāsasaṃgṛhītaḥ prabhāvaḥ|
1309:162: sa tena pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānena jātakān pūrvān bodhisattvacaryāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhe bhagavati prasādajananārthaṃ gauravotpādanārthaṃ ca vicitrānanekaprakārān prakāśayati itivṛttakāṃśca pūrvayogapratisaṃyuktān sattvānāṃ karmaphalavipākamārabhya|
1309:163: śāśvatadṛṣṭikānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ śāśvatadṛṣṭiṃ nāśayati tadyathā pūrvāntakalpakānāṃ śāśvatavādināmekatya-śāśvatikānāṃ vā|
1309:165: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā divyena śrotreṇa divyān mānuṣyakān śabdānāryānapyanāryānapi ghanānapyaṇukānapi vyaktānapyavktānapi nirmitānapyanirmitānapi dūrāntikasthān śṛṇoti|
1309:166: tatra divyāḥ śabdāḥ ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanopapannānāṃ sattvānām|
1309:167: sa cetpareṇābhogaṃ na karoti atha karoti tato'pi pareṇānyeṣūrdhvaṃ lokadhātuṣu śṛṇoti|
1309:171: ye buddhānāṃ buddhaśrāvakānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāñca|
1309:173: tadyathā saṃdarśayatāṃ samādāpayatāṃ vā samuttejayatāṃ saṃpraharṣayatāṃ kuśalasamādānamārabhyākuśalatyāgañca|
1309:174: tathā'saṃkliṣṭacittānāmuddeśaḥ svādhyāyo viniścayaḥ samyak codanā smāraṇāvavādānuśāsanī iti yadvā punaranyadapi kiñcit subhāṣitaṃ sulapitamarthopasaṃhitam|
1309:177: ye sattvānāṃ mṛṣāvādapaiśunyapārūṣyasaṃbhinnapralāpaśabdā adho vā'pāyopapannānāmūrdhvaṃ vā devopapannānāṃ tiryagvā manuṣyeṣūpapannānām|
1309:179: ye mahāsattvasaṃghaśabdā vā vividhairvā kāraṇaiḥ kāryamāṇānāmārttasvaraṃ kandamānānāṃ vikrośatāṃ vā meghastanitaśabdā vā śaṃkhabherīpaṭahaśabdā vā|
1309:190: yatra grāme kṣetre vihāre vā tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā viharati tatra ye śabdā niścaranti tān sthāpayitvā tadanyatra yāvadaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu|
1309:192: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyutikāle'pi cyutānapi suvarṇadurvarṇān hīnapraṇītānaparānte ca jātān|
1309:195: yadrūpaṃ nirmitaṃ yacca divyamacchaṃ rūpamadho yāvadavīcimūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanam|
1309:196: sa cedadha ūrdhvaṃ vānyeṣu lokadhātuṣu rūpadarśanamārabhyābhogaṃ karoti tiryagyāvadaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvaṃ rūpagataṃ paśyati|
1309:197: antatasteṣu teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tāṃstāṃstathāgatān vicitreṣu mahatsu parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu niṣaṇṇān dharma deśayataḥ paśyati|
1309:198: tatra divyena cakṣuṣā tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā daśasu dikṣu kāyaceṣṭitaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ dṛṣṭvā yathāyogaṃ yathārha teṣu sattveṣu pratipadyate|
1309:199: divyena ca śrotreṇa vākceṣṭitaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ śrutvā teṣu sattveṣu yathāyogaṃ yathārhaṃ pratipadyate|
1309:200: evaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā divyena śrotreṇa bodhisattvastathāgato vā samāsena karma karoti|
1309:202: iha bodhisattvo vā tathāgato vā pareṣāṃ daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ kleśaparyavasthitamapi cittaṃ jānāti|
1309:203: vigatakleśaparyavasthānamapi kleśasānubandhaṃ sānuśayamapi kleśaniranubandhaṃ niranuśayamapi mithyāpraṇihitamapi cittaṃ jānāti|
1309:204: tadyathā tīrthikacittaṃ sāmiṣābhiprāyasya kliṣṭamapi cittaṃ samyak praṇihitamapi cittaṃ jānāti|
1309:207: madhyamacittaṃ jānāti tadyathā sarveṣāṃ rūpadhātūpapannānāṃ sattvānām|
1309:208: praṇītamapi cittaṃ jānāti tadyathā sarveṣāmārūpyopapannāṃ sattvānām|
1309:210: ekena paracittajñānenaikasya sattvasya yasya yadyathā yādṛśaṃ yāvaccitaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati tatsakṛdyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti|
1309:211: ekenaiva paracittajñānena prabhūtānāmapi sattvānāṃ yeṣāṃ yadyathā yādṛśaṃ yāvaccittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati tadapi sakṛdyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti|
1309:212: sā punariyamabhijñā buddhasya bodhisattvānāmindriyaparāparajñānāya sattvānāṃ nānādhimuktijñānāya nānādhātucaritajñānāya yathāyogañca pratipatsu citrāsu nirvāṇapuraḥsarīṣu samyaksanniyogāya|
1309:215: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā kleśānāṃ kṣayaprāptiṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti|
1309:216: prāpto mayā parairvā āsravakṣayo na veti|
1309:221: bodhisattvaḥ punaḥ sarvaṃ caitat prajānātyāsravakṣayañca svayaṃ na sākṣātkaroti|
1309:223: ataḥ sāsravāñca vastu bodhisattvaḥ sahasravairna vijahāti|
1309:225: na ca saṃkliśyata iti so'sya sarvaprabhāvāṇāṃ mahattamaḥ prabhāvo veditavyaḥ|
1309:226: tena khalvāsravakṣayajñānena buddhabodhisattvāḥ svayaṃ na kliśyante|
1309:231: sa punareṣa dānādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prabhāvaḥ samāsataścaturbhirākārairveditavyaḥ|
1309:233: dānaṃ dadad bodhisattvo dānavipakṣaṃ mātsaryaṃ prajahāti|
1309:240: paratra ca yatra yatra pratyājāyate āḍhyo bhavati mahābhogo mahāpakṣo mahāparivāra ityeṣa caturākāro dānasya prabhāvo nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ|
1309:241: kāyavāksaṃvaraśīlaṃ samādadāno bodhisattvaḥ śīlavipakṣaṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ prajahāti|
1309:244: dauḥśīlyapratyayaṃ bhayamavadyaṃ vairaṃ prajahadātmānamanugṛhaṇāti sukhaṃ svapan sukhaṃ pratibudhyamānaḥ|
1309:255: ātmānañca parañca mahato bhayātparitrāyamāṇastayā kṣyāntyā ātmānañca paraṃścānugṛhṇāti|
1309:259: ityayañcaturākāraḥ kṣānteḥ prabhāvo nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ|
1309:260: ārabdhavīryo bodhisattvo viharan vīryavipakṣaṃ kausīdyaṃ prajahāti|
1309:263: ārabdhavīryaśca sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharannavyavakīrṇaḥ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaḥ pūrveṇāparaṃ viśeṣādhigamaṃ paśyan prītiprāmodyenātmānamanugṛhṇāti|
1309:264: kuśalapakṣābhiyuktaśca paraṃ na kāyena vācā vā viheṭhayati|
1309:270: dhyānaṃ samāpadyamāno bodhisattvo dhyānavipakṣaṃ kleśaṃ kāma vitarkaprītisukharūpasaṃjñādīṃścopakleśān prajahāti|
1309:271: bodheśca saṃbhārabhūtaṃ sanniśrayabhūtaṃ bhavati tadasya dhyānam|
1309:276: ityeṣa caturākāro dhyānaprabhāvo nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ|
1309:279: dānenāpi priyavāditayāpyarthacaryayāpi samānārthatayāpi ca sattvān paripācayati|
1309:281: sarvatra nyāyopadeśena dṛṣṭe dharme saṃparāye ca hitasukhābhyāṃ sattvānapyanugṛhṇāti|
1309:292: tribhiśca sthānaistuṣitopapannānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ deva putrāṇāmabhibhavaḥ divyenāyuṣā divyena varṇena divyena yaśasā|
1309:293: upapadyamānasya ca mātuḥ kukṣāvudāreṇāvabhāsena lokadhātuspharaṇaṃ saṃprajānataśca mātuḥ kukṣipraveśaḥ sthānaṃ nirgamo janma ca|
1309:297: carame ca bhave paścime janmani sarvapratyarthikairmārānīkairapi sarvopakramaiścābādhyatā|
1309:302: svayañcānācārya kamekākina eva ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre mahābodherabhisaṃbodhaḥ|
1309:303: brahmaṇā ca sahāṃpatinā svayamupasaṃkramya loke saddharmadeśanāyai adhyeṣaṇā|
1309:306: bodhisattve ca mṛgapakṣiṇāmapyantataḥ kṣudramṛgāṇāmapi paramā viśvāsyatā|
1309:308: tiraścāmantikāttathāgatasya pūjā tadyathā markaṭo madhvaneḍakaṃ tathāgatāyānupradattavān|
1309:309: pratigṛhīte ca tasmin bhagavatā sa markaṭo hṛṣṭamānasaḥ pratyavasṛṣṭaḥ sa nṛtyamānaḥ|
1309:310: bhagavantamevoddiśya tathāgataḥ snāsyati taṃ snāpayiṣyāmīti meghapratīkṣaṇā|
1309:311: vṛkṣamūle ca bodhisattvasya tathāgatasya vā santiṣṭhatastasya sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ prācīnanimnāsu chāyāsu tasya vṛkṣasya chāyayā kāyāvijahanatā|
1309:314: smṛtasya ca pratisaṃviditānāṃ vedanānāṃ saṃjñānāṃ vitarkāṇāmutpādaḥ sthānaṃ nirodhaśca|
1309:317: tadyathā unmattāḥ kṣiptacittāḥ tathāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā svacittaṃ pratilabhante|
1309:320: raktānāṃ rāgaparyavasthānāṃ vigacchati dviṣṭānāṃ dveṣaparyavasthānaṃ mūḍhānāṃ mohaparyavasthānam|
1309:338: na cāvaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati yāvad dvitīyamālopaṃ prakṣipati|
1309:340: parinirvāṇasamaye ca mahāpṛthivīcāla ulkāpātā diśo dāhā antarikṣe devadundubhīnāmabhinadanam|
1309:341: so'pi sahaja eva tathāgatānāṃ prabhāvo nābhijñāsaṃskṛtaḥ|
1309:347: iha tathāgato bodhisattvo vā'prameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmaprameyāsaṃkhyena prabhāvopāyena yathā'rthakriyā bhavati tadyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti|
1309:349: sarvaprakāreṇa cābhijñāprabhāveṇa dharmaprabhāveṇa sahajena prabhāveṇa samanvāgato bhavati|
1309:353: śrāvakasya tu saha sattvadhātunā dvisāhasro lokadhāturabhijñāviṣayaḥ|
1309:356: tathā hi te ekasyaivātmano damāya pratipannāḥ|
1309:359: etānākārān sthāpayitvā buddhabodhisattvānāṃ tadanyaḥ prabhāvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ sādhāraṇo veditavyaḥ|
1309:360: tadevaṃ sati śrāvakapratyekabuddhā eva tāvadbuddhabodhisattvaiḥ saha na tulyābhijñā bhavanti|
1309:362: yaścāpi prātihāryaprabhāvo buddhabodhisattvānāmṛddhyādeśanānuśāsti-saṃgṛhītaḥ so'pyabhijñāprabhāva eva yathāyogaṃ praviṣṭo veditavyaḥ ṛddhiviṣayacetasaḥ paryāyāsravakṣayajñānābhijñāprabhāveṣu|
